statements: SELECT * FROM wildlife_data;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM wildlife_data WHERE conservation_status='Endangered';
SELECT id, species_name, habitat_type FROM wildlife_data WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_data WHERE habitat_type='Forest' ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM wildlife_data WHERE population_size < 500 AND conservation_status='Vulnerable';
SELECT * FROM wildlife_data WHERE population_size > 1000 ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT species_name, habitat_type FROM wildlife_data WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT population_size, habitat_type FROM wildlife_data ORDER BY population_size DESC, habitat_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_data WHERE conservation_status = 'Vulnerable' AND habitat_type = 'Forest';
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM wildlife_data ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population WHERE population_size > 1000
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM wildlife_population
SELECT habitat_type, habitat_name FROM habitat WHERE area > 500
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population ORDER BY species_id DESC
SELECT species_name, habitat_name FROM wildlife_population JOIN habitat ON wildlife_population.habitat_id = habitat.habitat_id
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population WHERE population_size > 1000 ORDER BY species_name ASC, population_size DESC;
SELECT habitat_name, COUNT(*) AS total_species FROM wildlife_population JOIN habitat ON wildlife_population.habitat_id = habitat.habitat_id GROUP BY habitat_name ORDER BY total_species DESC;
SELECT species_name, SUM(population_size) AS total_population FROM wildlife_population GROUP BY species_name HAVING total_population > 50000;
SELECT DISTINCT species_name FROM wildlife_population WHERE population_size > 5000;

SELECT habitat_name, area, COUNT(*) AS total_species FROM wildlife_population JOIN habitat ON wildlife_population.habitat_id=habitat.habitat_id WHERE area > 1000 GROUP BY habitat_name, area ORDER BY total_species DESC;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population LIMIT 10
SELECT id, species_name, last_observed FROM wildlife_population WHERE population_size > 1000
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_location FROM wildlife_habitat ORDER BY habitat_name ASC
SELECT * FROM conservation_efforts WHERE budget > 50000 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM conservation_efforts
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population WHERE population_size > 1000 ORDER BY species_name DESC

SELECT species_name, habitat_name, last_observed FROM wildlife_population INNER JOIN wildlife_habitat ON wildlife_population.habitat_id = wildlife_habitat.id WHERE wildlife_population.last_observed >= '2020-01-01'
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM conservation_efforts WHERE budget > 50000 ORDER BY start_date
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population WHERE habitat_id IN (SELECT id FROM wildlife_habitat WHERE habitat_location = 'Forest')
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM wildlife_population WHERE population_size BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY species_name
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM Species WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest';
SELECT habitat_name, location, habitat_area FROM Habitat WHERE habitat_area > 1000;
SELECT population_count, observation_date FROM Population WHERE species_id = 1 ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT conservation_status, conservation_actions FROM Conservation WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, population_size, habitat_type FROM Species WHERE population_size > 1000 ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT habitat_name, location, habitat_area FROM Habitat WHERE habitat_area BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY habitat_name ASC;
SELECT population_count, observation_date FROM Population WHERE observation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT species_name, conservation_status, conservation_actions FROM Species INNER JOIN Conservation ON Species.species_id = Conservation.species_id WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT * FROM WildlifePopulation;
SELECT population_id, species_name, population_size FROM WildlifePopulation WHERE habitat_type='Forest';
SELECT habitat_id, habitat_name, habitat_type, habitat_location FROM Habitat ORDER BY habitat_location DESC;
SELECT effort_id, effort_type, effort_description FROM ConservationEfforts WHERE effort_type='Protection';
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM Researcher WHERE researcher_area_of_expertise='Ecology';
SELECT * FROM WildlifePopulation ORDER BY population_size DESC, species_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM WildlifePopulation WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest';
SELECT * FROM ConservationEfforts WHERE effort_type LIKE '%Rehabilitation%' AND effort_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_location FROM Habitat WHERE habitat_type = 'Grassland' AND habitat_location LIKE '%Africa%';
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_area_of_expertise FROM Researcher ORDER BY researcher_area_of_expertise ASC, researcher_name DESC LIMIT 5;
